txt_en: Success is the sum of small efforts — repeated day in and day out.
txt_cn: 成功就是日复一日那一点点小小努力的积累。
author: Robert Collier

txt_en: Working hard is important. But there is something that matters even more: believing in yourself.
txt_cn: 努力很重要，然而更重要的是：相信自己。
author: 《哈利·波特与凤凰社》

txt_en: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
txt_cn: 应对压力最强大的武器，是你有能力换个想法。
author: William James

txt_en: It doesn't matter where you are, you are nowhere compared to where you can go.
txt_cn: 跟你可以去到的地方相比，你身处何处并不重要。
author: Bob Proctor

txt_en: Don't find a fault. Find a remedy.
txt_cn: 别纠缠于谁对谁错，重要的是找到解决办法。
author: 亨利·福特

txt_en: Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.
txt_cn: 抱着必胜的信念行动。
author: Charles F. Kettering

txt_en: Hard work beats talent when talent fails to work hard.
txt_cn: 有天分却不努力，就会被努力的人击败。
author: 凯文·杜兰特

txt_en: Magic is believing in yourself; if you can do that, you can make anything happen.
txt_cn: 相信自己是种魔法，能做到这一点，就可以实现任何事。
author: 歌德

txt_en: There is no pressure when you are making a dream come true.
txt_cn: 在实现梦想的路上，是不存在压力的。
author: 内马尔

txt_en: The very things that hold you down are going to lift you up.
txt_cn: 什么让你摔倒，什么就能让你翱翔。
author: 《小飞象》

txt_en: Kindness is more important than wisdom, and the recognition of this is the beginning of wisdom.
txt_cn: 善良比智慧重要，承认这一点，才是智慧的开始。
author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

txt_en: Whatever you believe with feeling becomes your reality.
txt_cn: 无论什么，只要发自心底地坚信，都能成真。
author: Brian Tracy

txt_en: The very best thing you can do for the whole world is to make the most of yourself.
txt_cn: 你能为这个世界做的最好的事，就是充分发挥自己的才能。
author: Wallace Wattles

txt_en: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
txt_cn: 要么写值得读的书， 要么就做值得写的事。
author: 本杰明·富兰克林

txt_en: Lights will guide you home. And ignite your bones.
txt_cn: 光芒会指引你回家，点燃你的希望与勇气。
author: Coldplay, "Fix You"

txt_en: Let our advance worrying become advance thinking and planning.
txt_cn: 把事前忧虑的时间，花在事前的思索与准备上。
author: 温斯顿·丘吉尔

txt_en: Until you make peace with who you are, you'll never be content with what you have.
txt_cn: 只有与真实的自己和平相处，才能对自己所拥有的感到满足。
author: Doris Mortman

txt_en: Keep moving forward, and if it's time to go, it's time.
txt_cn: 保持前进，步履不停，如果是时候该走了，那就顺其自然。
author: Stan Lee

txt_en: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
txt_cn: 你不必生而伟大，但要开始变得伟大。
author: Zig Ziglar

txt_en: There are far, far better things ahead than any we leave behind.
txt_cn: 比起遗落在过去的，未来还有更加美好的在等待着我们。
author: C.S. Lewis

txt_en: Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.
txt_cn: 善良的话语或许很简短，很简单，但产生的回响却是无穷止尽。
author: Mother Teresa

txt_en: The greater the obstacle, the more glory in overcoming it.
txt_cn: 阻碍越大，逾越过去就越光荣。
author: 莫里哀

txt_en: A book should serve as the ax for the frozen sea within us.
txt_cn: 书籍是一把利斧，凿开我们内心冰封的海洋。
author: 弗兰兹·卡夫卡

txt_en: If you really want to do something, you'll find a way. If you don't, you'll find an excuse.
txt_cn: 只要想做，就能找到办法；如果不想，找到的便只是借口。
author: Jim Rohn

txt_en: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
txt_cn: 生活的一成是发生在我身上的事情，剩下的九成取决于我如何应对。
author: Charles Swindoll

txt_en: Press forward. Do not stop, do not linger in your journey, but strive for the mark set before you.
txt_cn: 继续前行！不要停下脚步！不要在路上流连！向着前面的目标奋进！
author: George Whitefield
